title: Talk Show
description: Inquiry is the name of the show.Power is the name of the game. And Lester Corbett is the star who runs the show and plays the game better than any man in town. He's America's favorite TV personality. He's genial, witty, candid, and casual on-camera. To watch him is to love him. To know him is something else again...
author: Noel B. Gerson
